channel.title: gitlab on bad gateway
channel.description: Recent content in gitlab on bad gateway

item.title: multi-architecture docker builds
item.description: Wouldn’t it be nice to have your Docker images come out of the oven ready to run on anything?

item.title: tweaking the gitlab kubernetes installer
item.description: GitLab has a lovely feature that can bring up a Kubernetes cluster and install build runners on it with a single click. But you can’t tweak it.

item.title: using a private container registry with gitlab
item.description: In the process of migrating our CI from self-hosted Jenkins to GitLab, I’ve encountered a couple of hurdles.
